entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6 except plus 2 in onshore winds. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High 6 except plus 2 in onshore winds. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
